Definition.WordDefinition: Solvay, NY (village, FIPS 68286) Location: 43.05828 N, 76.21199 W Population (1990): 6717 (3115 housing units) Area: 4.3 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 13209
Solvay n : Belgian chemist who developed the Solvay process and built factories exploiting it (1838-1922) [syn: {Ernest Solvay}]
